org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy

类 ExecutionGraphCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.ExecutionGraphCache
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ExecutionGraphCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Cache for AccessExecutionGraph which are obtained from the Flink cluster. Every cache entry has an associated time to live after which a new request will trigger the reloading of the AccessExecutionGraph from the cluster.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  ExecutionGraphCache.ExecutionGraphEntry
      Wrapper containing the current execution graph and it's time to live (TTL).

    • 字段概要

      private Time timeout 
      private Time timeToLive

      • size

        public int size()

      • getExecutionGraph

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<AccessExecutionGraph> getExecutionGraph(JobID jobId,
                                                                                      RestfulGateway restfulGateway)
        Gets the AccessExecutionGraph for the given JobID and caches it. The AccessExecutionGraph will be requested again after the refresh interval has passed or if the graph could not be retrieved from the given gateway.
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the AccessExecutionGraph to get
        restfulGateway - to request the AccessExecutionGraph from
        返回:
        Future containing the requested AccessExecutionGraph

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Perform the cleanup of out dated ExecutionGraphCache.ExecutionGraphEntry.
